meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rudy Stegemoeller June Vester Carol Ann Hilton Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2529.

td.p: Rudy Stegemoeller, an attorney from Poestenkill, New York
June Vester, a homemaker from Titusville, New Jersey
Carol Ann Hilton, a fundraiser from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,002)

tr.td: THE 1930s
STOCK SYMBOLS
BODIES OF WATER
COOKING
FAMOUS MEREDITHS
FRENCH PHRASES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Who is Gifford Pinchot?)
(June: He was Chief Forester under Harding. [Laughs])
(Alex: Oh, going back quite some time.
...
(Carol Ann: [On reveal of her response] Who is Roosevelt?)
(Alex: Sorry. You\'d have had to be more specific as well. There are a lot of Roosevelts, as you know.)
JuneWho is Gifford Pinchot?
$4,700
Carol AnnWho is Rooseve[cut off, unreadable]
$3,901
RudyWho is Muir
$1,001
John Muir')
